data.title: Nardin Statement April 13, 2023
data.meta_description: Nardin Statement April 13, 2023 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Nardin Academy released a statement addressing recent complaints about the school. They emphasized their commitment to providing a high-quality education and safe environment for students. An independent investigation found the faculty complaints to be factually incorrect. The school also initiated a third-party assessment of its operations and governance to ensure the overall health of the school. Moving forward, Nardin remains committed to fostering diversity and engagement with its mission.
